includedAssets.title: Now You Know
includedAssets.synopsis: News about Edie spreads, shocking the neighborhood. Lynette battles the effects of chemotherapy and a new family moves to Wisteria Lane.

includedAssets.title: Smiles Of A Summer Night
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep2 - Smiles Of A Summer Night
includedAssets.synopsis: Lynette kicks Tom out of her chemotherapy, Susan gets mistaken for a stripper and Bree attempts to steal a recipe.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lynette kicks Tom out of her chemotherapy, Susan gets mistaken for a stripper and Bree attempts to steal a recipe.

includedAssets.title: The Game
includedAssets.synopsis: Bree tells her friends what she overheard, Stella makes Lynette some special brownies to help her through chemotherapy and Susan throws a charades party.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: News about Edie shocks Wisteria Lane. Fourth season of the smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.

includedIn.title: Desperate Housewives
includedIn.synopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Four housewives' lives are devastated when their friend commits suicide, but that's just the start of a string of shocking events on Wisteria Lane.
